blocks.name: caofcan
blocks.content: Transfer a cancellation law like ~ mulcan to the function operation. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 16-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm caofcan(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), co(c0, cof(c1), c3)), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c4, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c4, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(cv(s1), c7), wcel(cv(s2), c7))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, wceq(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), co(c0, cof(c1), c3)), wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c3), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  ralbidva(hs0, c4, w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c3), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))
  bitrd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c3), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c3), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c4, c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c4, c0, c1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wb(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c6), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c7))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, c0, c6, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, c2, c7, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, c3, c7, w0)
  caovcang(s0, s1, s2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c6, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), co(c0, cof(c1), c3)), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c3), cv(hs0))))), wfn(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), c4), wfn(co(c0, cof(c1), c3), c4))
  offn(c0, c1, c2, c4, c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  offn(c0, c1, c3, c4, c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  ffnd(c0, c4, c6, w0)
  inidm(c4)
  eqfnfv(hs0, co(c0, cof(c1), c2), c4, co(c0, cof(c1), c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wfn(c2, c4), wfn(c3, c4))
  ffnd(c2, c4, c7, w0)
  ffnd(c3, c4, c7, w0)
  eqfnfv(hs0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cof(c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cof(c1), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caofcan(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[oF(c1)]c2)=(c0[oF(c1)]c3)↔ c2 = c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c4 → c6))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c4 → c7))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c4 → c7))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c6 ∧ s1 ∈ c7 ∧ s2 ∈ c7))→((s0[c1]s1)=(s0[c1]s2)↔ s1 = s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, (c0[oF(c1)]c2)=(c0[oF(c1)]c3), c2 = c3, ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,((c0[oF(c1)]c2)` hs0)=((c0[oF(c1)]c3)` hs0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c2 ` hs0)=(c3 ` hs0)))
  ralbidva(hs0, c4, w0, ((c0[oF(c1)]c2)` hs0)=((c0[oF(c1)]c3)` hs0), (c2 ` hs0)=(c3 ` hs0))
  bitrd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), ((c0[oF(c1)]c2)` hs0)=((c0[oF(c1)]c3)` hs0), (c2 ` hs0)=(c3 ` hs0), ((c0 ` hs0)[c1](c2 ` hs0))=((c0 ` hs0)[c1](c3 ` hs0)))
  eqeq12d(((c0[oF(c1)]c2)` hs0), ((c0[oF(c1)]c3)` hs0), ((c0 ` hs0)[c1](c2 ` hs0)), ((c0 ` hs0)[c1](c3 ` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  ofval(hs0, c4, c0, c1, c2, (c0 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0), c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  eqidd((c2 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  ofval(hs0, c4, c0, c1, c3, (c0 ` hs0), (c3 ` hs0), c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  eqidd((c0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  eqidd((c3 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  syl13anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (((c0 ` hs0)[c1](c2 ` hs0))=((c0 ` hs0)[c1](c3 ` hs0))↔(c2 ` hs0)=(c3 ` hs0)), w0, (c0 ` hs0)∈ c6, (c2 ` hs0)∈ c7, (c3 ` hs0)∈ c7)
  simpl(w0, hs0 ∈ c4)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c4, c0, c6, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c4, c2, c7, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c4, c3, c7, w0)
  caovcang(s0, s1, s2, (c0 ` hs0), c6, (c2 ` hs0), c7, (c3 ` hs0), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[oF(c1)]c2)=(c0[oF(c1)]c3)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,((c0[oF(c1)]c2)` hs0)=((c0[oF(c1)]c3)` hs0))), (c0[oF(c1)]c2)[Fn]c4, (c0[oF(c1)]c3)[Fn]c4)
  offn(c0, c1, c2, c4, c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  offn(c0, c1, c3, c4, c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  ffnd(c0, c4, c6, w0)
  inidm(c4)
  eqfnfv(hs0, (c0[oF(c1)]c2), c4, (c0[oF(c1)]c3))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 = c3 ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c2 ` hs0)=(c3 ` hs0))), c2[Fn]c4, c3[Fn]c4)
  ffnd(c2, c4, c7, w0)
  ffnd(c3, c4, c7, w0)
  eqfnfv(hs0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c3, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c3, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[oF(c1)]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[oF(c1)]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: ofsubid
blocks.content: Function analogue of ~ subid . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 5-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofsubid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wceq(co(c2, cof(cmin), c2), cxp(c0, csn(nat0))))
} = {
  offveq(hs0, c2, cmin, c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wfn(c2, c0))
  ffn(c2, c0, cc)
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wfn(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0), wf(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, csn(nat0)))
  fconst(c0, nat0)
  ffn(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), c0, csn(nat0))
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  subidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(c2, c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrn(c2, c0, cc, cv(hs0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), c0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofsubid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ))→(c2[oF(-)]c2)=(c0 × { 0 }))
} = {
  offveq(hs0, c2, cmin, c2, (c0 × { 0 }), c0, c1, (c2 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ)))
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c0 → ℂ))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c0 → ℂ), c2[Fn]c0)
  ffn(c2, c0, cc)
  mp1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ)), (c0 × { 0 })[Fn]c0, ((c0 × { 0 }): c0 → { 0 }))
  fconst(c0, nat0)
  ffn((c0 × { 0 }), c0, { 0 })
  eqidd((c2 ` hs0), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ))∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eqtr4d(((c2 ` hs0)[-](c2 ` hs0)), ((c0 × { 0 })` hs0), nat0, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ))∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantll(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c0 → ℂ), hs0 ∈ c0, ((c2 ` hs0)[-](c2 ` hs0))= 0)
  subidd((c2 ` hs0), ((c2 : c0 → ℂ)∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  ffvelrn(c2, c0, cc, hs0)
  adantl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ)), hs0 ∈ c0, ((c0 × { 0 })` hs0)= 0)
  fvconst2(hs0, c0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 × { 0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℂ)))
}

blocks.name: ofmul12
blocks.content: Function analogue of ~ mul12 . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 13-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofmul12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))), wceq(co(c2, cof(cmul), co(c3, cof(cmul), c4)), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c2, cof(cmul), c4))))
} = {
  offveq(hs0, c2, cmul, co(c3, cof(cmul), c4), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c2, cof(cmul), c4)), c0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  offn(c3, cmul, c4, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  offn(c3, cmul, co(c2, cof(cmul), c4), c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cmul, c4, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cfv(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c2, cof(cmul), c4)), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mul12d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c4, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cmul, co(c2, cof(cmul), c4), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  ffnd(c3, c0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))
  offn(c2, cmul, c4, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cmul, c4, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  ffnd(c2, c0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc)))
  ffnd(c4, c0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc)))
  inidm(c0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqidd(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cc))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))

thm ofdivrec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wceq(co(c2, cof(cmul), co(cxp(c0, csn(nat1)), cof(cdiv), c3)), co(c2, cof(cdiv), c3)))

  1cnd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cfv(co(c2, cof(cdiv), c3), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc), wf(c2, c0, cc))
  ffvelrn(c2, c0, cc, cv(hs0))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))

  ffvelrn(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0))

  3expb(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  eqcomd(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0)))

thm ofdivdiv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  sylan(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc), wf(c2, c0, cc))
  ffvelrn(c2, c0, cc, cv(hs0))

  sylib(wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))

  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, co(c2, cof(cmul), c4), cdiv, c3, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  offn(c2, cmul, c4, c0, c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))

  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cmul, c4, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c0, c0, c1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  ffnd(c2, c0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  ffnd(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))

  inidm(c0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, cc)), wa(wf(c3, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wf(c4, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
